name: addPersistentStore(ofType:configurationName:at:options:)
desc: Adds a specific type of persistent store at the provided location.DeprecatedUse addPersistentStore(type:configuration:at:options:) instead.
declaration:
func addPersistentStore(ofType storeType: String, 
      configurationName configuration: String?, 
                     at storeURL: URL?, 
                options: [AnyHashable : Any]? = nil) throws -> NSPersistentStore
